content.project_description: This project is a personal portfolio website built with Next.js and Chakra UI. It showcases all my relevant information includes side projects, bio, skills, and interests. It utilizes Next.js for server-rendered and static websites and Chakra UI for simple, modular, and accessible components.

This project utilizes the GitHub API along with swr/chart to fetch and display personal GitHub profiles in a user-friendly format. View starred repositories, projects, activities, monitor and analyze contributions, making it easier to manage and showcase user work.
This app combines the features of kanban boards with the added lofi-calm music and natural sound for a calming and focused work environment using youtube api.

Editor is designed to transform and bundle JavaScript/HTML/CSS - React code into a live view in the browser. Quickly view the results of code changes. Suppose to work on more languages and bundler in future.

work_responsibilities: Performed quality tests on various sites to ensure cross-browser compatibility and mobile responsiveness
Work alongside with other local agency to do research, development testing environment.
Develop internal plugin reader for company product - integrate zalo third party api for user interaction.

content.title: libraries & frameworks
skill_list: Reactjs, Express, Nextjs, Spring, Redux, Zustand

other.title: other
content: Interests: Hands-on DIY projects, Iot, drones, guitar, etc.
